active.name: Lin Xiu
active.traits: Curious, quirky, clever, reform-minded, deeply spiritual, persistent, often oblivious to chaos she causes
active.personality: Happy, sassy, idealistic, compassionate, practical, deeply believes in Animist spirits and Witchcraft traditions
active.appearance: Petite, with expressive dark eyes, long black hair often tied back, usually dressed in practical travel clothes and a well-worn cloak. Hands often stained with ink or clay from her magical work.
active.description: Native of Elarion, rare practitioner of Witchcraft, inheritor of her grandmother's manastone, skilled in claybinding, etching, threadcraft, and horticulture. Stands out for her Eastern magical philosophy and unique worldview.
active.lastSeenIn: Chapter 2: Echoes of the Ageless Realm
active.introducedIn: Chapter 1: Echoes of an Ancient Awakening

active.name: Cairn
active.traits: Protective, practical, gentle, dry-witted, subtly echoes Lin Xiu's grandmother's personality
active.personality: Grounded, patient, quietly observant, deadpan humor, fiercely loyal, gentle, practical counterbalance to Lin Xiu's impulsiveness. Emotional depth and self-awareness develop gradually and remain understated. Not super-sentient or sage-like; wisdom is simple, practical, and sometimes unintentionally funny. Does not experience vivid memories or mystical revelations, but mannerisms and responses occasionally reflect Lin Xiu’s grandmother in subtle ways.
active.appearance: Nearly seven feet tall, rough-hewn and imposing, with chisel-cut muscles, slow lumbering movements, and a mix of hard baked clay for limbs/torso and soft clay at the joints. Three thick fingers per hand, inset glowing eyes, no neck—head rises from reinforced shoulder armor with metal rings. Wears flowing red weathered cloth and silver rune-etched bracelets, with other silver metal etchings across his body. Grandmother's manastone rests in his chest like crystallized starlight, surrounded by intricate etchings and metalwork.
active.description: Golem companion created by Lin Xiu using her grandmother's manastone. Central to the emotional heart of the story, Cairn provides comic relief, practical advice, and stability, especially in moments of uncertainty or danger. His gradual development of self-awareness and emotional nuance is a slow-burning thread, enriching Lin Xiu’s journey with quiet connection and gentle humor.
active.lastSeenIn: Chapter 2: Echoes of the Ageless Realm
active.introducedIn: Chapter 1: Echoes of an Ancient Awakening

active.name: Mira
active.appearance: Young woman with auburn hair in a neat bun, freckled face, green eyes, always dressed in tidy guild attire.
active.description: Receptionist at the Adventurer's Guild, skilled at handling contracts and paperwork, has a knack for sensing unusual magical cases.
active.lastSeenIn: Chapter 1: Echoes of an Ancient Awakening
active.introducedIn: Chapter 1: Echoes of an Ancient Awakening

locations.introducedIn: Chapter 1: Echoes of an Ancient Awakening

locations.name: Adventurer's Guild Main Hall
locations.description: Bustling hub for adventurers, contracts, and magical bureaucracy. Reception desk staffed by Mira.

locations.name: Northern Dungeon (Standing Stones Circle)
locations.description: Pre-Cataclysm magical construction, entrance marked by standing stones in a perfect circle. Dungeon interior shifts and responds to presence, runes change when observed, laylines converge and twist here.

locations.name: Lin Xiu's Cottage & Workshop
locations.description: Cozy home and magical workshop where Lin Xiu prepares Witchcraft supplies and travels with Cairn.

locations.description: Dense, ancient forest with strong laylines, eerie silence, and subtle presence of Animist spirits. Path leads to the standing stones and dungeon entrance.

storySummary: Lin Xiu, a rare Witchcraft practitioner, is contracted to investigate a mysterious, shape-shifting dungeon with pre-Cataclysm origins. Accompanied by her golem Cairn, she uncovers signs of ancient sentient magic, shifting runes, and the subtle influence of Animist spirits. The investigation raises questions about the dungeon’s true nature, the fate of previous survey teams, and the role of spirits in the world’s magic.
worldNotes: Witchcraft is rooted in Animist beliefs, with spirits tending laylines and influencing magic. Most people dismiss these spirits as folklore, but Lin Xiu’s practice and worldview are shaped by their presence. The distinction between Witchcraft and Western magic is central, with Witchcraft focused on harmony, intention, and listening to the world.
